mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into draws (prodUid, prodName, prodTel, drawPrice, drawName, drawStatus, drawWidth, drawHigh, authName, urlHd, urlSimple, drawDesc, ownCount, ownFinishCount, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime) values (#{prodUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prodTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drawName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drawHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{authName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urlHd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{urlSimple,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownFinishCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update draws set prodUid = #{prodUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prodName = #{prodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prodTel = #{prodTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drawPrice = #{drawPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drawName = #{drawName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drawStatus = #{drawStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drawWidth = #{drawWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drawHigh = #{drawHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, authName = #{authName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urlHd = #{urlHd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urlSimple = #{urlSimple,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drawDesc = #{drawDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ownCount = #{ownCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ownFinishCount = #{ownFinishCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ownPrice = #{ownPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opName = #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opId = #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, prodUid, prodName, prodTel, drawPrice, drawName, drawStatus, drawWidth, drawHigh, authName, urlHd, urlSimple, drawDesc, ownCount, ownFinishCount, ownPrice, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime from draws where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, prodUid, prodName, prodTel, drawPrice, drawName, drawStatus, drawWidth, drawHigh, authName, urlHd, urlSimple, drawDesc, ownCount, ownFinishCount, ownPrice, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime from draws

select id, prodUid, prodName, prodTel, drawPrice, drawName, drawStatus, drawWidth, drawHigh, authName, urlHd, urlSimple, drawDesc, ownCount, ownFinishCount, ownPrice, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime from draws where id <= #{arg0} and drawStatus = 1 order by drawPrice
desc
asc
limit #{arg1}, #{arg2}
select count(1) from draws where drawName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{drawName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select id, prodUid, prodName, prodTel, drawPrice, drawName, drawStatus, drawWidth, drawHigh, authName, urlHd, urlSimple, drawDesc, ownCount, ownFinishCount, ownPrice, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime from draws where drawName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{drawName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{length,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update draws set ownFinishCount=ownFinishCount+1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ownCount > ownFinishCount
